thread.section_title: Hotel le Chat Noir - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: centrally located
thread.title_full: centrally located - Review of Hotel le Chat Noir, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: billnpat75
title: centrally located
text:
Hotel was perfect for us as it was centre to everything, hotel rooms were lovely as was the breakfast, didn't quite get to manage how the boiled eggs were cooked, I kept losing mine lol .
The rooms, well ours anyway was lovely, slight view of the top of the Eiffel tower, we were on the 5th floor. would recommend this hotel to friends and will be going back again when I go back to Paris.
